name: Dudley Public Art Heritage Trail (Town Centre Trail Part 2)

ai.summary: A short, easy 1.2 km urban heritage trail through Dudley town centre, highlighting public art installations and local history along a flat, paved route.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, paved sidewalks with occasional curb crossings; urban environment with street furniture and public art.
ai.safety_notes: Watch for traffic at crossings and obey pedestrian signals; be mindful of crowds and temporary event closures; monitor uneven paving near art installations; keep valuables secure.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn; rainy days may require a light jacket.
